title: Create Bubble Tea model for validation results display
body:
## Description
Replace `DisplayValidationResults()` static display with an interactive Bubble Tea model.

## Current Problem
- `DisplayValidationResults()` uses direct `fmt.Printf` for output
- Static display with no interactivity
- Mixed icon/fallback logic scattered in function
- No keyboard navigation or expansion capabilities

## Tasks
- [ ] Create `ValidationModel` struct with validation results
- [ ] Implement `tea.Model` interface (Init, Update, View)
- [ ] Use `viewport.Model` for scrollable content
- [ ] Add keyboard navigation (up/down, expand/collapse details)
- [ ] Style with lipgloss for consistent theming
- [ ] Replace `DisplayValidationResults()` calls with new model

## Files to Create
- `ccw/ui/validation_model.go`

## Files to Modify
- `ccw/ui/terminal_ui.go` (replace `DisplayValidationResults()`)
- `ccw/ui/bubbletea_models.go` (add state for validation)

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Interactive validation results with keyboard navigation
- [ ] Expandable/collapsible sections for lint/build/test results
- [ ] Consistent styling with existing Bubble Tea models
- [ ] No direct `fmt.Printf` usage for validation display
- [ ] Support for both console and interactive modes

## Dependencies
None - can be implemented independently.
